fields.original_string:
private static final Set<Class> FINAL_CLASSES = new HashSet<Class>(Arrays.asList(
            String.class,
            Number.class,
            Byte.class,
            Double.class,
            Float.class,
            Long.class,
            Short.class,
            Integer.class,
            Boolean.class
    ));

    ))
